E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1974
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Frank Jaciuk



Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1974
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Lou Brock



Date: Thursday, 6/19/1974
Subject: Masayuki Kakefu learns new position
Masayuki Kakefu has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Rightfield.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Monday, 6/23/1974
Subject: Progress of Dave Revering
Dear Sir,
Dave Revering has nothing more to prove at A Bakersfield Dodgers!
He has an AVG of .314 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
